name: Backrooms: Level 0
description:
If you no clip out of reality, you can find yourself in the backrooms. This has happened to you. Your goal is to escape the backrooms by following your phones signal. But, you are not alone. Avoid the monsters, stay sane, and try not to starve in this horror maze exploration game.

A game designed by Dapper Rabbit Games powered by the Unreal Engine.

Features:

  • Random maze every time
  • Hunger and sanity system
  • Seven monsters 
  • Seven ways to die
